name: Dérive
description:
Dérive 

Dérive : [French], [Lit : "drifting"]
To depart from the normal route, to go on an adventure.

A first person exploratory adventure EP, by Cel Davison, with music by Derek Daley.

Wander through a lost land: piece together your own folktales of the history of an ancient realm. What events once transpired and who used to dwell here?

[This game has no set ending. Just explore until you feel as though you've seen enough.]
